common.description: Collection of free utility tools for file conversion, generators, and other productivity tools

wordCounter.title: Word Counter
wordCounter.description: Count words, characters, paragraphs, and sentences in your text
wordCounter.placeholder: Type or paste your text here...

backgroundRemover.title: Background Remover
backgroundRemover.description: Remove background from images easily - All processing in browser
backgroundRemover.tips: Auto mode works well for white/bright backgrounds. Color mode for removing specific colors. Edge mode for automatic detection.

imageConverter.title: Image Converter
imageConverter.description: Convert image formats (JPG, PNG, WebP) - All processing in your browser

colorPsychology.title: Color Psychology & Composition
colorPsychology.description: Analyze color psychology and composition from images - All processing in browser
colorPsychology.aboutDescription: Color psychology studies how colors affect emotions, behavior, and human perception. This analysis helps understand the message conveyed through the color palette in your image.

qrCode.title: QR Code Generator
qrCode.description: Generate QR Code from URL, text, or other data
qrCode.enterTextToGenerate: Enter text or URL to generate QR Code

passwordGenerator.title: Password Generator
passwordGenerator.description: Generate strong and random passwords for maximum security

errors.selectAtLeastOne: Please select at least one option!

colorConverter.title: Color Converter
colorConverter.description: Convert colors between HEX, RGB, HSL, and CMYK

errors.enterColorValue: Please enter a color value first!
errors.invalidHex: Invalid HEX format. Use format #RRGGBB or RRGGBB
errors.invalidRgb: Invalid RGB format. Use format: R, G, B (example: 255, 0, 0)
errors.invalidHsl: Invalid HSL format. Use format: H, S%, L% (example: 0, 100%, 50%)
errors.invalidCmyk: Invalid CMYK format. Use format: C%, M%, Y%, K% (example: 0%, 100%, 100%, 0%)

caseConverter.title: Case Converter
caseConverter.description: Change text format with various styles
caseConverter.placeholder: Type or paste your text here...

textCleaner.title: Text Cleaner

articles.defaultContent1: {toolName} is one of the best tools to help you with various tasks. This tool is designed with a simple and easy-to-use interface, so anyone can use it without special expertise.
articles.defaultContent2: With {toolName}, you can complete your tasks faster and more efficiently. This tool is available for free and can be accessed directly from your browser without downloading additional software.
articles.defaultContent3: To use this tool, simply follow the steps available on the page. Each step is designed to facilitate the process and ensure you get the best results.
articles.defaultContent4: If you have questions or experience problems while using the tool, feel free to contact our support team. We are ready to help you anytime.
articles.defaultTips: Use this tool responsibly and make sure you respect copyright and usage policies of the content you process.
